scripts.build-adminlte: cp -r node_modules/admin-lte/dist/css public/adminlte/css && cp -r node_modules/admin-lte/dist/js public/adminlte/js && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css public/adminlte/plugins/fontawesome-free/css && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts public/adminlte/webfonts
